NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: battery organ
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: An organ that can store electrical energy and release it when needed.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: scaled skin
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: Scales from lizards, or "dragons", that bring changes not only to the skin surface but also to some glands, significantly reducing the damage taken.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: fire sac
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: An organ that can store flammable liquid and spray it when needed, with faster recovery than the Impid Xenotype.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: acid sac
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: An organ that can store corrosive liquid and spray it when needed, without toxicity, but with strong corrosiveness.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: gene control
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: You can use the organs in your body to generate a xenogerm and inject it into the target, but this will make you very tired.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: cryptobiosis
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: A custom gene extracted from bears, frogs, insects, and lizards that allows you to enter a "camouflage" state to get through some difficult days.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: stun gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: A modified version of the toxin from spiders in nature that can cause the target to be stunned for a long time (up to 1 year), or can be injected with an antidote in reverse to immediately end the target's paralysis effect.
